abstract: Comcast‘s venture-capital arm, Comcast Interactive Capital, is helping the company create an ecosystem of businesses that advance new cable technologies and, if all goes well, boost Interactive Capital’s bottom line. The Philadelphia Inquirer takes a look at the venture, which backs about six to eight start-ups a year with initial investments ranging from $2 million to $10 million.
lead_paragraph: Comcast‘s venture-capital arm, Comcast Interactive Capital, is helping the company create an ecosystem of businesses that advance new cable technologies and, if all goes well, boost Interactive Capital’s bottom line. The Philadelphia Inquirer takes a look at the venture, which backs about six to eight start-ups a year with initial investments ranging from $2 million to $10 million.
